message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $175. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $120?

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $155. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some money. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $130?

Hi Bob, I understand you're still looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $130. I'm willing to make one more offer: I'll sell it to you for $145. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it.
I understand that this is your final offer, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle again. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $140?
